# currentNSToolbarSection

**Instance Property**

The toolbar section that the navigation bar is currently using.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var currentNSToolbarSection: UINavigationBar.NSToolbarSection { get }
```

## Building with Mac Catalyst

- **behavioralStyle**: The behavioral style of the navigation bar.
- **preferredBehavioralStyle**: The preferred behavioral style of the navigation bar.
- **UINavigationBar.NSToolbarSection**: Constants that determine how the system hosts the navigation bar in an AppKit toolbar.
